creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: vase with flared lip, narrow neck; richly decorated with blue, red, and gold foliage; alternating vignettes with blue border: orange and gold phoenix in maple tree; smaller vignette with foliage; delicate orange and red foliage motif inside lip
marks: Signature on bottom: [ 深川製 ] (Fukagawa sei)
medium: Porcelain, underglaze cobalt, onglaze red, gold
title: Vase
